title: Support Vulkan GPU API on UWP
body: Vulkan is an open 3D graphics and compute API, supported by many games ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_games_with_Vulkan_support ) and game engines ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vulkan_(API)#Game_engines ).

comments.body: This would be awesome, as we could use a single API for all platforms.
Furthermore, every major GPU vendor seems to support Vulkan.
